post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
워코폴리스에서 본 잡포스팅인데요, 제가 지원할 수 있는 영역이 아니네요. 아마 우리 커뮤니티원에 계신 분 중에 qualified된 분이 계실 것 같아 올려봅니다.
HARTECH SEARCH CONSULTANTS JAVA DEVELOPERS-BACK--END
Job Type: Full Time Location: Toronto-West End, ON Job Category: Computers-Software Industry: Recruitment/Staffing Number Of Positions: 3 Date Posted: Aug 20, 2003 Contact E-mail: hartech@sympatico.ca
REQUIREMENTS Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Telecommunications with
2 or more years of software development experience using Java Strong knowledge of Object Oriented Programming methodologies Development experience with distributed programming: CORBA, Java RMI, Sockets Working knowledge of UNIX (Solaris) Ability to work well with others in a team environment Strong written and verbal communication skills
RESPONSIBLITIES Supported by team leader, design and develop according to system requirements provided by Product Development and Management (PD&M) Develop unit test cases to verify that the implemented feature meets the requirement
ATTRIBUTES Preferred experience will include:
EJB C++ Development experience with any relation DBMS: Oracle, Informix, DB2 MMS, WAP, HTTP, XML/SOAP Experience in telephony/telco is an asset.
Please send your resume in rtf.format to the attention of Sharon Hirsh Please refer to the position being applied to.
Contact E-mail: hartech@sympatico.ca
post.title: JAVA DEVELOPERS-BACK--END
